main event: A woman in Dayton, Ohio spotted a large red ball in the sky that kept disappearing and reappearing over the course of 20 minutes.
interesting points: The object had a saucer-like appearance.
The woman observed the object for about half an hour.
The object was estimated to be less than 45 degrees above the horizon.
The weather was cloudy at the time of the sighting.
The object's altitude and azimuth were recorded as it moved, indicating it was tracked by the observer.
sighted object: a large red ball in the sky
